model_answer: The answer is (C): Event 4 — The aging.us.com page and narration list breakthroughs: new screening methods and six chemical cocktails that reverse aspects of aging without loss of cellular identity. This event led to the development of the pill that can rejuvenate the entire body and potentially be patented soon.

The answer is A: Event 0 — The opener claims a potential age-reversal pill could arrive in “2033,” shown alongside an AGING webpage quoting Dr. David Sinclair. This event sets the context for the discussion of the age-reversal pill and its potential availability in the near future.
